content.rendered: Kofi is a chartered certified accountant. He has work experience in industry and professional practice as an accountant and auditor. Since 1998, he has been engaged professional teaching (ACCA and CIMA) and corporate training. In academia, he has been a visiting/associate lecturer at various universities in the UK including the Glyndwr University London, University of Bedfordshire and University of West London. Currently he is an Academic Assessor at Regent College London teaching business modules.
